attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: okay, so footballers represent our country? so what! they kick a ball and get paid millions!! thousands of pounds could be used to make our enviroment a better place. more hospitals, schools, more important stuff other than bling for the footballers wives. to make a point, nurses and doctors, save lives and don't even get paid half of what footballers get paid.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
